meanings.definition: The process of obtaining something from a source or origin.
meanings.sent1: Studying the derivations of words helps us understand their meanings better.
meanings.sent2: The derivations of languages can be traced back through history.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the derivations of ancient myths can lead to fascinating discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The derivations of cultural traditions often reveal interesting connections.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the derivations of scientific theories can be enlightening.

meanings.definition: The formation of a word from another word or base.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the derivations of compound words can be helpful in spelling.
meanings.sent2: Etymology is the study of the derivations of words in different languages.
meanings.sent3: Creating new derivations in a fictional language can be a fun linguistic exercise.
meanings.sent4: The derivations of slang terms often reflect societal changes.
meanings.sent5: Teachers often explain the derivations of words to help students remember them better.
